title: Bedroom Goals & Relationship Roles with Lisa Bilyeu
itunes:title: Bedroom Goals & Relationship Roles with Lisa Bilyeu
itunes:subtitle: On today’s show, Emily welcomes back badass businesswoman and host of Women of Impact, Lisa Bilyeu, to talk about how couples can set goals and roles to reach together –– and Em is answering your emails. They discuss ways to figure out exactly...
description:
On today’s show, Emily welcomes back badass businesswoman and host of Women of Impact, Lisa Bilyeu, to talk about how couples can set goals and roles to reach together –– and Em is answering your emails.

They discuss ways to figure out exactly what your needs are in a relationship and how to meet them with a partner and why it’s so crucial to check in with your partner regularly about the state of your relationship. Plus, Emily gives advice on what to do when you’ve got mismatched kink levels and whether or not there can ever be TOO much sex talk.

Thank you for supporting our sponsors who help keep the show FREE: Good Vibrations, Apex, SiriusXM, PlusOne

Follow Emily on all social: @sexwithemily

Follow Lisa on Instagram: @lisabilyeu @womenofimpact

For even more sex advice, tips & tricks, visit: sexwithemily.com


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
